snippet.title: What the Bat (Meta Quest) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Trying something a little different: Here is some first-person VR gameplay of What the Bat, from the makers of What the Golf. Your two hands are baseball bats and you have to solve all life's problems with bats and baseballs. 

Not strictly a baseball game, but close enough. Wanted to try this out with a sort of tangential half-baseball game first before I try the real core baseball stuff that's out there so I can get feedback on recording techniques. If this video is too herky-jerky to watch, let me know. Or if you want a webcam shot in the corner to show me stumbling around... Sure, I could do that. 

Recorded on Meta Quest 2.
